title: Tragic Outage: Optus Failure Leads to Multiple Deaths
description: A technical failure at Optus, Australia's second-largest telecommunications provider, disrupted emergency call services, leading to the deaths of three people. The incident occurred during a network upgrade impacting 600 customers in South Australia, Western Australia, and the Northern Territory, prompting an investigation by the company.
content: A recent technical glitch at Optus, Australia's second-largest telecom provider, resulted in a grave outcome: three fatalities after disrupted emergency call services. CEO Stephen Rue confirmed that the failure happened during a network upgrade, affe... [638 chars]
